item.title: Fantômes issue 2 cover
item.description: Pen and ink illustration of a gothic cemetery scene for the upcoming 2nd issue of my ghost story and haunting images zine Fantômes . Pen and ink illustration of a cemetery with a large iron gate, a lantern on one of the gate pillars, plenty of tombstones in the distance and a victorian house in the distance Illustration in context on the cover of the zine with some text on the back and the logo on the front
